snippet: The Federal Reserve says household net worth increased $1.5 trillion in the quarter, to $81.8 trillion.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that household net worth increased $1.5 trillion to $81.8 trillion in the first quarter, pushed up by rising stock markets and higher home prices.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve says household net worth increased $1.5 trillion in the quarter, to $81.8 trillion.

headline.main: Household Wealth Rises on Strength of Home Prices
headline.print_headline: Household Wealth Rises on Strength of Home Prices
